io.hekate.cluster.split

Interface SplitBrainDetector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddressReachabilityDetector, HostReachabilityDetector, JdbcConnectivityDetector, SplitBrainDetectorGroup

    public interface SplitBrainDetector
    Cluster split-brain detector.

    This interface represents a component which is responsible for cluster split-brain detection. Cluster service calls this component right before the local node joins to the cluster or when some other node leaves the cluster. Implementations of this component should perform a quick check (possibly by consulting with some shared resource) and verify that local node can reach other nodes.

    If this component detects that local node can't reach other nodes then the cluster service will take actions according to the SplitBrainAction defined in its configuration.

    Note that it is possible combine multiple detectors with the help of SplitBrainDetectorGroup.

    See Also:
    ClusterServiceFactory.setSplitBrainDetector(SplitBrainDetector)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isValid(ClusterNode localNode)
      Performs a split-brain check and returns true if local node can reach other members of the cluster.

    • Method Detail

      • isValid

        boolean isValid(ClusterNode localNode)
        Performs a split-brain check and returns true if local node can reach other members of the cluster.

        If this method returns false then the cluster service will take actions according to the SplitBrainAction defined in its configuration.

        Parameters:
        localNode - Local node (where the check is performed).
        Returns:
        true if local node can reach other members of the cluster.
